summary: Fixed duplicate 'searchState' declaration error in frontend/app/staff/scan.tsx. Removed the duplicate declaration at line 352, keeping the original declaration at line 339. This resolves the SyntaxError that was preventing the iOS bundle from building. The app should now compile successfully.
current_status: Syntax error fixed. Removed duplicate searchState declaration. Frontend should now bundle successfully. The Expo server is running and should automatically reload with the fix. Next steps: (1) Verify the app loads in iOS simulator, (2) Test scan functionality, (3) Monitor for any other compilation errors.
